#summary Latest binaries

= Latest pre-compiled binaries =

Here are the latest binaries you may download for flashing your '9X, without needing to recompile from source.

There are a lot of options, you choose the one which fits you the best!

Even more can be found using companion9x, which let you "automagically" configure options, perform the download of selected firmware and check for updates.

For further information have a look to companion9x website: [http://code.google.com/p/companion9x/]

=== Unmodified '9X Radio Version ===

 * *[http://open9x.freehosting.com/binaries/open9x-stock-en.hex]* -- For stock hardware with no internal re-wiring English language.

 * *[http://open9x.freehosting.com/binaries/open9x-stock-fr.hex]* -- For stock hardware with no internal re-wiring French language.

 * *[http://open9x.freehosting.com/binaries/open9x-stock-heli-templates-en.hex]* -- The same (EN) with heli and templates menus.

 * *[http://open9x.freehosting.com/binaries/open9x-stock-heli-templates-fr.hex]* -- The same (FR) with heli and templates menus.

 * *[http://open9x.freehosting.com/binaries/open9x-stock-heli-templates-audio-en.hex]* -- The same (EN) with speaker mods for softer sounding tones.

 * *[http://open9x.freehosting.com/binaries/open9x-stock-heli-templates-audio-fr.hex]* -- The same (FR) with speaker mods for softer sounding tones.
